verbose_text: Apo AI in HDL [XREF_BIBR] and plasma glutathione peroxidase [XREF_BIBR] reduce PC hydroperoxides, and an infusion of apo Al-PC discs raising low HDL is effective in restoring the endothelial function [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: AI in HDL [ XREF_BIBR ] and plasma glutathione peroxidase [ XREF_BIBR ] reduce PC
